00022 //      Track.h

00024 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00025 
00026 #ifndef __TRACK_CPP
00027 #define __TRACK_CPP
00028 
00029 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00030 
00031 #include "Track.h"
00032 
00033 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00034 // CONSTRUCTORS, DESTRUCTOR, ASSIGNMENT
00035 
00036 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00037 Track::Track(SoundSample* wave, SoundSample* amp)
00038     :wave_(wave), amp_(amp)
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00043 Track::Track(m_sample_count_type sampleCount,
00044        m_rate_type samplingRate,
00045        bool zeroData)
00046     :wave_(new SoundSample(sampleCount, samplingRate, zeroData)),
00047      amp_(new SoundSample(sampleCount, samplingRate, zeroData))
00048 {
00049 }
00050 
00051 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00052 Track::Track(const Track& t)
00053 {
00054     wave_ = new SoundSample(*t.wave_);
00055     if (t.amp_ == 0)
00056     {
00057         amp_ = 0;
00058     }
00059     else
00060     {
00061         amp_ = new SoundSample(*t.amp_);
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00066 Track& Track::operator= (const Track& t)
00067 {
00068     if (this != &t) // beware self assignment
00069     {
00070         wave_ = new SoundSample(*t.wave_);
00071         if (t.amp_ == 0)
00072         {
00073             amp_ = 0;
00074         }
00075         else
00076         {
00077             amp_ = new SoundSample(*t.amp_);
00078         }
00079     }
00080     return *this;
00081 }
00082 
00083 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00084 Track::~Track()
00085 {
00086     delete wave_;
00087     if (amp_ != 0) delete amp_;
00088 }
00089 
00090 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00091 // PUBLIC METHODS
00092 
00093 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00094 SoundSample& Track::getWave()
00095 {
00096     return *wave_;
00097 }
00098 
00099 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00100 bool Track::hasAmp()
00101 {
00102     return (amp_ != 0);
00103 }
00104 
00105 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00106 SoundSample& Track::getAmp()
00107 {
00108     if (amp_ != 0)
00109     {
00110         return *amp_;
00111     }
00112     else
00113     {
00114         cerr << "Track::getAmp() ERROR, no Amp SoundSample available." << endl;
00115         return (* new SoundSample(0));
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00120 void Track::composite(Track& t, m_time_type startTime)
00121 {
00122     wave_->composite(*t.wave_, startTime);
00123     if ( hasAmp() && t.hasAmp() )
00124     {
00125         amp_->composite(*t.amp_, startTime);
00126     }
00127 }
00128 
00129 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00130 void Track::scale(m_value_type factor)
00131 {
00132     wave_->scale(factor);
00133     if (amp_ != 0) amp_->scale(factor);
00134 }
